Ụlọ akụ Central Africa (ACB) bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ego ise mbụ na ụlọ ọrụ pụrụ iche nke African Union
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-eweghara ibu ọrụ nke Fund Monetary Africa.

Mgbe emechara ya nke ọma, ACB ga-abụ naanị onye na-enye otu ego Africa ("Afro" ma ọ bụ "Ariq") na/ma ọ bụ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ nchekwa mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-abụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ akụ nke Gọọmenti Africa na/ma ọ bụ mpaghara otu, ọ ga-abụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nkeonwe na nke ọha na eze n'akụkụ ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara Africa, ọ ga-ahazi, nyocha na ilekọta ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ nke Africa na mmekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ na mpaghara, ọ ga-edozi mmasị na mgbanwe gọọmentị
ọnụego nke nwere ike ma ọ bụ ghara ịdị na ya na ụlọ akụ etiti mpaghara; ha niile jikọtara ya na nchịkwa gọọmentị Afrịka

Otu ego Afrịka ga-agụnye ego nke mpaghara mpaghara etiti nke gụnyere ego mba (The Arab Maghreb Union (AMU) - Northern Afriq, Southern African Development Community (SADC) - Southern Afriq, Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) - Western Afriq ma ọ bụ ECO, East African Community (EAC), Eastern Afriq - Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA) - Central Afriq wdg.Ọpụpụ ọzọ
